meanings.definition: a spicy smoked sausage made with pork
meanings.sent1: I love the flavor of andouille in my jambalaya.
meanings.sent2: The andouille sausage added a delicious kick to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The andouille sausage danced in the pot, spreading its spicy aroma.
meanings.sent4: The andouille sausage was a bold warrior in the sea of bland ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The andouille sausage sizzled on the grill, releasing its tantalizing scent.

meanings.definition: a type of French cuisine typically made with pork and spices
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served a delectable andouille dish.
meanings.sent2: The andouille cuisine reminded me of my trip to France.
meanings.sent3: The andouille dish told jokes to the other menu items.
meanings.sent4: The andouille cuisine was a symphony of flavors on my plate.
meanings.sent5: The andouille dish painted a vivid picture of French culinary artistry.
